Line1.1275AB: Mongrel flesh eaters see our shame, our weakness, and gnaw at our wounds.
Line3.1275AB: Seasons against the cannibals have left scars deeper than the flesh. There is no glory in torture. No reward in a slow death.
Line5.1275AB: Now some of my most battle-scarred warriors have gone missing. Only blood marks their trail.
Line7.1275AB: I do not believe they are dead. They would not go so quietly.
